sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
As we haue euer from our infancie had manifold proofes of Gods great goodnes towards us in his protecting of us from many dangers of our person, ... England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I) James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
2 sheets (versos blank).
By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie., Imprinted at London : anno 1603.
Title from opening lines of text. Imprint from colophon. At foot of text: Wilton the twenty fourth day of October 1603. of our reigne of England, France and Ireland the first, and of Scotland the thirty seuenth yeere. Forbidding factious efforts to reform the church. Cf. STC. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
As we haue euer from our infancie had manifold proofes of Gods great goodnes towards us in his protecting of us from many dangers of our person, ... England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I) James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
2 sheets (versos blank).
By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie., Imprinted at London : anno 1603.
Title from opening lines of text. Imprint from colophon. At foot of text: Wilton the twenty fourth day of October 1603. of our reigne of England, France and Ireland the first, and of Scotland the thirty seuenth yeere. Forbidding factious efforts to reform the church. Cf. STC. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
the Kings most excellent Maiestie.
Robert Barker
